issue.title: [Docs] Document Crossbow builds outside of code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16370](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16370). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Find a way to document the different builds that are available on-demand and run regularly (nightly) outside of docker-compose.yml & tasks.yml.

Something like a "build matrix", ideally we would also have a "supported-config matrix" to compare against each other.

CC `[~raulcd]`
